channel.title: CWE-565 on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in CWE-565 on ZAP

item.title: Loosely Scoped Cookie
item.description: Cookies can be scoped by domain or path. This check is only concerned with domain scope.The domain scope applied to a cookie determines which domains can access it. For example, a cookie can be scoped strictly to a subdomain e.g. www.nottrusted.com, or loosely scoped to a parent domain e.
